description.en: Xrpalike Gene (XAG) system is a global  open-source payment network based on the Internet, which helps people to transfer money to any currency. Transaction confirmation can be completed simply and quickly in a few seconds, and transaction costs are close to zero. This is a completely new payment mode provided by Internet finance, which is different from SWIFT. Xrpalike Gene (XAG)  system extends the expansibility of decentralization to realize the application of new fields different from XRP system, including the asset mapping token, confirmation, transaction and circulation of any tangible assets and intangible assets, in order to realize the economic trends of value circulation and credit circulation.
